scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run optimize-images && npm run replace-content
scripts.start: docker stop ehint-runtime 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm ehint-runtime 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d -p 80:80 -v $(pwd)/dist:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro -v $(pwd)/conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro --name ehint-runtime nginx
scripts.stop: docker stop ehint-runtime 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm ehint-runtime 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start:built: npm run build && docker stop ehint-built 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm ehint-built 2>/dev/null || true && docker build -t ehint-built . && docker run -d -p 81:80 --name ehint-built ehint-built
scripts.stop:built: docker stop ehint-built 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm ehint-built 2>/dev/null || true
